about_the_game:
Behold! A game that is brimming with domination, humiliation, and bodily transformation. Oh, but there's more... brainwashing, tentacles, breast mutation, futanari, and lots of alien and parasitic sex!


build your lair

Resist invasion by outsiders

corruption your prisoner

Fight and capture them!

corruption the Queen into your defense building
----------------- Gameplay -----------------
Tower Management + Sidescroller
Play as the forces of evil and corrupt the entire world!
Attack settlements, capture female prisoners, and use them to expand your lair~♥♥♥♥♥♥!!!
Use your prisoners to infiltrate the humans and leave them utterly defenseless~♥♥♥♥♥♥!!!
----------------- Sexy Time -----------------
Uses Spine's paper doll animation system
----------------- Simulation -----------------
Use slaves, build seedbeds and gain resources to expand your base.
Use the tech tree to unlock Tentacle / Slime / Plant / Insect / Demon seedbeds.
----------------- Combat -----------------
Control tentacles or slaves. Upgrade your characters to become even more powerful and lead them to conquer new maps.
----------------- Infiltration -----------------
Are your enemies too powerful? Send your well-trained prisoners to infiltrate them and lower their defenses!
----------------- Tech Tree -----------------
Five tech trees available for upgrade: Tentacles / Slime / Plants / Insects / Demons

content_descriptors.notes:
"Latex Tentacles" is a game centered around themes of defeat, rape, and body modification.
This game also includes brainwashing, futanari, as well as sexual encounters with tentacles, parasites and monsters.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Latex Tentacles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Behold! A game that is brimming with domination, humiliation, and bodily transformation. Oh, but there's more... brainwashing, tentacles, breast mutation, futanari, and lots of alien and parasitic sex!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
